item.description:
Circle of Angels Gathering

March 17th

7pm - 9pm

Cost $25

Presented By Patricia Rainville...

.Patricia has been in the health and wellness business for 20 years. It began in 1990 with massage school where I found my true calling in the fields of alternative medicines and energies. While there I became interested in Reiki healing energy and became a reiki master. I also became interested in aromatherapy and herbs as a way to enhance healing and spent a season apprenticing with an herbalist.


Angels uplift and inspire us. They help to lighten our burdens and thereby help us to remember a lightness of being that is joyful and happy where things go more smoothly. Connect with the angels often, you'll be pleasantly surprised and delighted.


Circle of Angels is a spiritual meditation gathering. At each gathering we invoke the Archangels Michael and Raphael for clearing and healing and obtain individual message for those who attend.
The evening begins with a clearing meditation that will cleanse your energy and aura of fear cords, psychic debris, negative energies or entities.


Circle of Angels is a small gathering of about 6 - 8 people and each person receives hands on energy healing and a message. After this each attendant pull a card from an angel card oracle deck for additional details to your message.


There is also time at the end of the evening for sharing of experiences. People usually leave feeling relaxed, refreshed and revitalized.


Please be aware that the class is limited to 8 people. If you are interested in joining the class please call or email to reserve your spot.

Email solsticehealing@yahoo.com or Call 508-533-0669
item.name: Circle of Angels
